title: Haiti gang ambushes, kills 3 policemen as violence soars
description: Authorities say a gang near Haiti’s capital has ambushed and killed three police officers in the latest attack against an under-resourced and underfunded police department that has reported nearly two dozen officers slain so far this year

title: King's coronation: 3 crowns, 2 carriages and a shorter route
description: King Charles III will be taking a short cut and a smoother ride to Westminster Abbey, trimming the procession route his mother took in 1953 as he aims for a more modest coronation that will include some modern touches

title: Reports: IS land mine kills at least 6 civilians in Syria
description: Syrian state media says a deadly land mine explosion has killed at least six people

title: Guyana's Rupununi Rodeo celebrates local cowboy culture
description: Their horses’ hooves kick up dust amid blaring country music as participants enter the arena to begin the Rupununi Ranchers Rodeo, a celebration of the cowboy lifestyle on Guyana’s rugged Rupununi savannah

title: Ukraine live briefing: Ukraine fortifies border with Belarus; Kyiv seeks to avert further military leaks
description: Ukrainian leaders discussed how to stop leaks of sensitive information concerning the country’s defense plans after classified U.S. documents appeared online.

title: Tensions build around Jerusalem shrine after Syria rockets
description: Israeli warplanes and artillery have struck targets in Syria following rare rocket fire from its northeastern neighbor

title: Israel strikes back at Syria; thousands gather at Jerusalem holy sites
description: Israel launched air, artillery and drone strikes after rockets were fired from Syria. Thousands of Jewish and Muslim worshipers gathered in Old Jerusalem.

title: Cubans seek solutions and solace in Santer�a amid crises
description: While nearly 70% of Latin America’s 670 million people consider themselves Catholic, in Cuba, Santer�a is the name of the game

title: Russia nearly shot down British spy plane near Ukraine, leaked document says
description: The incident occurred months before a Russian fighter collided with an American MQ-9 drone over the Black Sea.

title: France: Marseille building collapses, fire stymies rescue
description: France’s interior minister says up to 10 people may be buried under the debris of a building that collapsed following an explosion in France’s port city of Marseille

title: Saudi officials visit Yemen’s capital for talks with rebels
description: Saudi officials are in Yemen’s capital for talks with the Iran-backed Houthi rebels, part of international efforts to find a negotiated settlement to Yemen’s nine-year war

title: Ukrainians celebrate Palm Sunday in church marred by dispute
description: Ukrainians have marked Palm Sunday in the country’s most revered Orthodox site that has been at the heart of a religious dispute playing out in parallel with the war against Russia

title: Avalanche in French Alps kills at least 4 people
description: Four people have died in an avalanche in the French Alps, according to France’s interior minister

title: South Africa police say prison escapee arrested in Tanzania
description: South African police say that a convicted murderer who faked his death to escape prison has been arrested in Tanzania following a two-week manhunt

title: Official: Afghan special forces kill 2 IS fighters in raid
description: A regional official says Afghan special forces killed two Islamic State fighters and arrested a third during an operation in the country’s west

title: Pope at Easter: Pray for Ukrainian, Russian people, refugees
description: Pope Francis has invoked prayers for both the Ukrainian and Russian people in his Easter message

title: As tiger count grows, India's Indigenous demand land rights
description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi announced Sunday to much applause that the country’s tiger population has steadily grown to over 3,000 since its flagship conservation program began 50 years ago after concerns that numbers of the big cats were dwindling

title: Streaming into Southeast Asia, Netflix faces repeated censorship demands
description: As Netflix expands rapidly in Southeast Asia, its commitment to artistic expression is being tested by Vietnam, Indonesia, Singapore, the Philippines and others.
